annotations.note: Protocol text describes regional gene expression markers in human brain organoids across developmental stages (1- and 5-month-old), including telencephalon, diencephalon, mesencephalon, metencephalon, myelencephalon, and spinal cord regions. Gene lists include EN1, EN2, FOXA2, EVX1, PAX5, PAX2, PAX8, IRX3, PTF1A, ATOH1, GBX2, LHX9, LHX1, PAX3, PHOX2A, DBH, HOXA2, HOXB2, KROX20, DBX1, IRX1, LMX1A, VSX2, RAX, CHX10, FOXG1, SIX3, LMO4, AUTS2, EMX2, PAX6, LHX2, NEUROD2, EOMES, GSX2, ASCL1, DLX1, DLX2, SALL3, MEIS2, PBX3, NKX2.1, NKX2.2, LHX6, OLIG2, NR2F2, HTR3A, OPT, TBX3, POMC, HOXA1, HOXB1, HOXB4, HOXB6, HOXC5. Cell types include Neural Progenitors (NP1–NP5), Inhibitory Neurons (IN1–IN5), Excitatory Neurons (EN1–EN3), IP-EN, IP-IN, Mural/Ependymal, Astrocytes, OPC, RG-CTX. Expression levels (pct.exp, avg.exp) are visualized via UMAP in Human Organoid Single-Cell Browser. Data derived from scRNA-seq of organoids. No experimental actions (e.g., transfer, incubation, measurement) are described—only annotation of gene markers and visualization methodology.
